Table of Contents

Namespace osu.Framework.Allocation

Classes

AccessModifierNotAllowedForCachedValueException

Occurs when attempting to cache a non-private and non-readonly field with an attached CachedAttribute.

AccessModifierNotAllowedForLoaderMethodException

Occurs when a method with an attached BackgroundDependencyLoaderAttribute isn't private.

AccessModifierNotAllowedForMemberException

Occurs when a dependency-related operation occurred on a member with an unacceptable access modifier.

AccessModifierNotAllowedForPropertySetterException

Occurs when the setter of a property with an attached ResolvedAttribute isn't private.

BackgroundDependencyLoaderAttribute

Marks a method as the (potentially asynchronous) initialization method of a Drawable, allowing for automatic injection of dependencies via the parameters of the method.

CachedAttribute

An attribute that may be attached to a class, interface, field, or property definitions of a Drawable to indicate that the value should be cached as a dependency. Cached values may be resolved through BackgroundDependencyLoaderAttribute or ResolvedAttribute.

CachedModelDependencyContainer<TModel>

A DependencyContainer which caches a TModel and members it contains attached with a CachedAttribute as dependencies.

DependencyContainer

Hierarchically caches dependencies and can inject those automatically into types registered for dependency injection.

DependencyNotRegisteredException

Occurs when an object requests the resolution of a dependency, but the dependency doesn't exist. This is caused by the dependency not being registered by parent CompositeDrawable through CreateChildDependencies(IReadOnlyDependencyContainer) or CachedAttribute.

InvokeOnDisposal

Instances of this class capture an action for later cleanup. When a method returns an instance of this class, the appropriate usage is:

using (SomeMethod())
    {
        // ...
    }

The using block will automatically dispose the returned instance, doing the necessary cleanup work.

InvokeOnDisposal<T>

Instances of this class capture an action for later cleanup. When a method returns an instance of this class, the appropriate usage is:

using (SomeMethod())
    {
        // ...
    }

The using block will automatically dispose the returned instance, doing the necessary cleanup work.

LongRunningLoadAttribute

Denotes a component which performs long-running tasks in its BackgroundDependencyLoaderAttribute method that are not CPU intensive. Long-running tasks are scheduled into a lower priority thread pool.

MultipleDependencyLoaderMethodsException

Occurs when multiple BackgroundDependencyLoaderAttributes exist in one object.

NullDependencyException

The exception that is thrown when attempting to cache null using CachedAttribute.

PropertyNotWritableException
ReadOnlyDependencyContainerExtensions
ResolvedAttribute

An attribute that is attached to properties of a Drawable component to indicate that the value of the property should be retrieved from a dependency cache. Properties marked with this attribute must be private and have a setter.

TimedExpiryCache<TKey, TValue>

A key-value store which supports cleaning up items after a specified expiry time.

TypeAlreadyCachedException

Structs

CacheInfo
ObjectHandle<T>

Wrapper on GCHandle that supports the IDisposable pattern.

ValueInvokeOnDisposal

Instances of this struct capture an action for later cleanup. The appropriate usage is:

using (SomeMethod())
     {
         // ...
     }

The using block will automatically dispose the returned instance, doing the necessary cleanup work.

This is a struct version of InvokeOnDisposal to be used when allocations are to be minimised.

ValueInvokeOnDisposal<T>

Instances of this struct capture an action for later cleanup. The appropriate usage is:

using (SomeMethod())
     {
         // ...
     }

The using block will automatically dispose the returned instance, doing the necessary cleanup work.

This is a struct version of InvokeOnDisposal to be used when allocations are to be minimised.

Interfaces

IDependencyActivatorRegistry

An interface for objects to register dependency activation functions with.

IDependencyInjectionCandidate

An interface that may be attached to objects to allow them to be used in Inject<T>(T).

IReadOnlyDependencyContainer

Read-only interface into a dependency container capable of injective and retrieving dependencies based on types.

ISourceGeneratedDependencyActivator

Implemented by source generators to inject dependencies into an object.

ISourceGeneratedLongRunningLoadCache

Delegates

CacheDependencyDelegate
InjectDependencyDelegate
